Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client.gui

Class MatchController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.gui.MatchController
public class MatchController
extends java.lang.Object
Core controller to menage the flow of the game. Here the board is shown in between the players with their divinity and another vbox to pick an action and to show messages.

    • MatchController

      public MatchController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      When created, this controller generates the board, the workers and the buildings, and the texts and alerts to display during the game.

    • setClientView

      public static void setClientView​(ClientView clientView)

    • setGui

      public static void setGui​(GUI gui)

    • createBoard

      public void createBoard()
      For every tile, a StackPane is created to host the buildings and the workers. After adding graphical properties, the stackpane is bound to an action action(StackPane)

    • action

      public void action​(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane s)
      Switches on which action to perform on the selected StackPane
      Parameters:
      s - Board's tile

    • placeWorkerOnClickedTile

      public void placeWorkerOnClickedTile​(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane s)
      Called when a worker has to be placed on the passed tile. Calls ClientView.workerPlacement(int, int, int, int)
      Parameters:
      s - passed stackpane (tile)

    • moveOnClickedTile

      public void moveOnClickedTile​(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane s)
      Called when a worker has to be moved on the passed tile. Calls ClientView.actionQuestion(Action, int, int)
      Parameters:
      s - passed stackpane (tile)

    • buildOnClickedTile

      public void buildOnClickedTile​(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane s)
      Called when a building has to be placed on the tile. Calls ClientView.actionQuestion(Action, int, int)
      Parameters:
      s - passed stackpane (tile)

    • buildDomeOnClickedTile

      public void buildDomeOnClickedTile​(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane s)
      Called when a dome has to be placed on the tile. Calls ClientView.actionQuestion(Action, int, int)
      Parameters:
      s - passed stackpane (tile)

    • handlePossibleActions

      public void handlePossibleActions​(java.util.Map<Action,​java.util.List<Pair<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer>>> possibleActions)
      Shows on the left of the screen the possible actions. If it is only one, then the action is automatically selected, otherwise the player has to click on the corresponding action. On the board the available tiles are highlighted.
      Parameters:
      possibleActions - map of actions with their possible positions, coming from the server

    • startTurn

      public void startTurn()
      Updates the textlabel

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn()
      Updates the textlabel

    • selectWorker

      public void selectWorker​(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane s)
      Method to select a worker on the specified tile. If the operation is not correct, an alert is displayed. If correct, calls ClientView.selectWorkerQuestion(int, int)
      Parameters:
      s - passed stackpane (tile)

    • placeWorkers

      public void placeWorkers​(java.lang.String username, int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Called to update the board with another player's workers' placement
      Parameters:
      username - Player placing workers
      x1 - first worker's coordinates
      y1 - first worker's coordinates
      x2 - second worker's coordinates
      y2 - second worker's coordinates

    • moveUpdate

      public void moveUpdate​(java.lang.String player, int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Updates the board when another player moves
      Parameters:
      player - player moving
      x1 - worker's starting coordinate
      y1 - worker's starting coordinate
      x2 - worker's destination coordinate
      y2 - worker's destination coordinate

    • buildUpdate

      public void buildUpdate​(java.lang.String player, int x, int y)
      Updates the board when another player builds
      Parameters:
      player - player building
      x - building coordinate
      y - building coordinate

    • setActionPlaceWorkers

      public void setActionPlaceWorkers()
      Sets the current action to placeworkers so that it can be caught in action(StackPane)

    • setActionSelectWorker

      public void setActionSelectWorker()
      Sets the current action to selectworker so that it can be caught in action(StackPane)

    • endTurnConfirmation

      public void endTurnConfirmation()
      Called at the end of the turn or if the user can choose to end their turn (depending on divinity's power). Calls ClientView.actionQuestion(Action, int, int)

    • setPlayers

      public void setPlayers()
      Places the players with their divinities in the left side vbox. If a divinity is clicked, godDescrAlertSetup(String, Image) is called.

    • godDescrAlertSetup

      public void godDescrAlertSetup​(java.lang.String godName, javafx.scene.image.Image godImg)
      Displays a box with a divinity's image and its description
      Parameters:
      godName - divinity clicked by the user
      godImg - image of the clicked divinity

    • getSantoriniFont

      public javafx.scene.text.Font getSantoriniFont​(int dimension)
      Returns a custom font used in the game
      Parameters:
      dimension - desired size
      Returns:
      font to be used

    • setSelectable

      public void setSelectable​(int x, int y, boolean val)
      Method to mark the tile as selectable
      Parameters:
      x - x tile coordinate
      y - y tile coordinate
      val - true if the stackpane is selectable

    • focusWorkers

      public void focusWorkers​(boolean value)
      It focuses the player's workers.
      Parameters:
      value - true if the tile contains the player's worker

    • getBoardCell

      public javafx.scene.Node getBoardCell​(int x, int y)

    • textMessage

      public void textMessage​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String header, java.lang.String msg)
      It displays a text message with the passed information
      Parameters:
      title - title for the message
      header - subtitle
      msg - text message

    • markAvailableTiles

      public void markAvailableTiles​(Action action)
      Highlights the selectable tiles inherent to an action.
      Parameters:
      action - action on which to perform the highlight check

    • loserPlayer

      public void loserPlayer()
      Changes the text message.

    • manageLoserPlayer

      public void manageLoserPlayer()
      Removes the workers of the losing player from the GUI's board

    • newStandardizedButton

      public javafx.scene.control.Button newStandardizedButton()
      Creates a button with the aid of a fxml file and makes it interactive
      Returns:
      button ready to use

    • opponentDefeated

      public void opponentDefeated​(java.lang.String username)
